name: Emirates NEW BUSINESS CLASS Cabin
description:
Recently, I had the chance to try out Emirates' BRAND NEW BUSINESS CLASS cabin on one of their new 777-300's. 

The flight was from Brussels to Dubai and I found the experience to be fantastic. The food was great, the crew were friendly, the seat was comfortable. It was a great flight! But, check out this video and draw your own conclusions.

The flight was also special because by pure coincidence, I sat next to famed YouTube Trip Reporter, Sam Chui.

Here's a link to my review of the Emirates NEW FIRST CLASS cabin:
https://youtu.be/AsswlMIo4vY

Here's a link to my conversation with SAM CHUI:
https://youtu.be/6T3EJ_HfQI4

For more trip reports, please subscribe to my channel!
https://www.youtube.com/jebbrooksflies

Check me out on Instagram:
https://www.instagram.com/jebbrooks/

And don't forget to take a look at my travel blog:
https://greenergrass.com/

Music: 
Cool Wet Sand - Gavin Luke
What's Up - Emil Kilrud
